items.text_for_match: Man City 'breathing down Arsenal's neck' as title 'belief' grows Pep Guardiola vowed his Manchester City side would "breathe down the neck of Arsenal" as they aim to hunt down the Premier League leaders in this fascinating title race. items.text_for_match: Burnley score three quickfire goals to stun Palace in comeback win Burnley score three goals in seven minutes as Scott Parker's side come from 2-0 down to beat Crystal Palace 3-2 at Selhurst Park in the Premier League.
